column5: Just booked a mid August trip there with my son. Many thanks to Mike Borger for his help...first class guy.  Has anyone ever fished this lake? Just looking for a little feedback, tips, etc to get the juices flowing more than they are.

Very glad I could help John!  And doubly glad I was able to help facilitate something for your most deserving son.  I could be wrong but you might have more luck if you post your question over on the Canada board at Walleye Central.  Beyond that if anyone else is considering a fly in trip drop me a line, I can almost certainly help.
